job_tasks.phrase: Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions using APIs to collect and analyze data, which are core data engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the application of collected data within AI models, a fundamental aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-gestuurde content & insights genereren - Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren op basis van trending topics en merkdata.
job_tasks.justification: The description focuses on developing systems that automatically generate content (captions, visuals, videos) using AI, which falls under generative modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren
job_tasks.justification: The act of 'developing systems' to create content implies building software applications that leverage AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren op basis van trending topics en merkdata.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development of systems that automatically generate content (captions, visuals, videos) using AI. This focus on generative capabilities, along with the use of social media APIs to inform these models, directly aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
